snippet.title: RiptideGP®: Renegade Mobile Gameplay Downtown Rush
snippet.description:
Check out the latest Gameplay footage from Riptide GP: Renegade!  New in RGPR are point to point race tracks like this city track, which allows for massive elevation changes with huge vertical jumps! 

In Riptide GP: Renegade, armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, outrun cops, and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.  The new game in the popular franchise brings all new tracks, vehicles, and characters, all playable in single player, split screen and online multiplayer races.

Riptide GP: Renegade is coming soon to iOS, Apple TV, Android, Android TV, Kindle, FireTV, Xbox One, PlayStation4, Windows 10, and Steam.  http://onelink.to/rgpr-vu
